snippet: The surprise rise in the purchasing managers’ index in August provided the latest indication that the world’s second-largest economy appears to have bottomed out after months of slowing growth.
lead_paragraph: The surprise rise in the purchasing managers’ index in August provided the latest indication that the world’s second-largest economy appears to have bottomed out after months of slowing growth.

headline.main: Chinese Manufacturing Grows More Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Chinese Manufacturing Grows More Than Expected
